attributes.action: Stronger Sentencing and Minimum Sentencing for Animal Abusers
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned believe that animal cruelty and in humane acts are on the increase, and that the government are the only ones who can help rid the UK of these horrific acts on defenceless animals.

We, the undersigned, would like to see tougher sentencing UK wide for those who abuse and commit acts of animal cruelty, as well as minimum sentencing to be enforced against those who commit these atrocious acts.

A recent spate of horrific acts of cats being mutilated, much of it too horrific to post, I have decided to set this petition free.
